rows.label: qst002301_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh, friends listen to Moruru?
Moruru have little problem right
now. Maybe friends can help.

rows.label: qst002301_msg0002
rows.name:
Is no big problem really.
Just want friends to ask few questions
of warrior monks in cathedral.

rows.label: qst002301_msg0003
rows.name:
Moruru specially interested in number
of guards in cathedral at night!

rows.label: qst002301_msg0004
rows.name:
Friends might not guess, but Moruru is
budding journalist! Wanting to write
article about security of Acedia!

rows.label: qst002301_msg0005
rows.name:
But then captured by zealous old
preacher-man during investigating.

rows.label: qst002301_msg0006
rows.name:
Now so busy listening to him that
Moruru can not investigate anything!

rows.label: qst002301_msg0007
rows.name:
So maybe friends could investigate
instead? Quick-quick?

rows.label: qst002301_msg0101
rows.name:
What? Friends still not investigate yet?
Moruru just want to know about
number of guards in cathedral at night.

rows.label: qst002301_msg0102
rows.name:
Warrior monks in cathedral should know
all about details. They probably tell
friends without any problems.

rows.label: qst002301_msg0103
rows.name:
When friends find out deets, come tell
Moruru quick-quick!

rows.label: qst002301_msg0104
rows.name:
Moruru too busy listening to boring
lecture of old man to help.
